bill.title: Revise Address Confidentiality Program and recorder fees
bill.description: To amend sections 111.42, 111.43, 111.45, 111.46, 111.48, 111.99, 149.43, 315.25, 317.13, 317.32, 319.28, 2303.12, and 5301.255 and to enact sections 111.431 and 321.25 of the Revised Code and to repeal Section 4 of S.B. 258 of the 134th General Assembly to make changes to the Address Confidentiality Program administered by the Secretary of State, to make changes to county recorder fees, to modify certain requirements for the 2022 primary election, and to declare an emergency.

history.action: Refer to Committee: Local Government and Elections
Reported - Substitute: Local Government and Elections
Effective 4/29/22 - Emergency: Sections 3 and 4 effective January 28, 2022.
